      • getEntities

        public java.util.List<QueryRelationsEntity> getEntities()
        Gets the entities. An array of entities to find relationships for.
        Returns:
        the entities

      • getContext

        public QueryEntitiesContext getContext()
        Gets the context. Entity text to provide context for the queried entity and rank based on that association. For example, if you wanted to query the city of London in England your query would look for `London` with the context of `England`.
        Returns:
        the context

      • getSort

        public java.lang.String getSort()
        Gets the sort. The sorting method for the relationships, can be `score` or `frequency`. `frequency` is the number of unique times each entity is identified. The default is `score`
        Returns:
        the sort

      • getFilter

        public QueryRelationsFilter getFilter()
        Gets the filter. Filters to apply to the relationship query
        Returns:
        the filter

      • getCount

        public java.lang.Long getCount()
        Gets the count. The number of results to return. The default is `10`. The maximum is `1000`.
        Returns:
        the count
